disconnected text: To start using the app, your wallet needs to be connected :)
choose amount text: Choose the amount you want to swap on your balance. You can check it on the top of the amount field that you want to swap :D
choose token text: You can choose any token on the list, if there is some missing you can try adding it by the contract address.
invalid token amount: Minimun amount for conversion is 0.1 or value is out of range(0-100)
max funds hint: Max to use all your funds
select start swapping: Select a token to start swapping
transaction details hint: Output is estimated. you will receive at least 99.95 AVAX or the transaction will revert.
